articles.content: Throughout the COVID pandemic, there's been one constant question we all want the answer to: When will things be back to normal? The new vaccines offer a route to something close to normalcy for many… [+501 chars]

articles.author: Ian Wheeler, Alicia Robinson, Deepa Bharath
articles.title: Orange County will intermittently close mass vaccination sites due to low supply - OCRegister
articles.description: Orange County will intermittently close its mass vaccination sites because of shipment disruptions caused by the severe cold weather gripping much of the country, officials announced Thursday, Feb.…
articles.content:
Shipment disruptions caused by the severe cold weather gripping much of the country are causing closures at mass vaccination sites in Orange County, officials announced Thursday, Feb. 18.
